ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Or do you have a Book which you study,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Or have you a Book in which you read
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Or do you have a Book wherein you read
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Do you have a book from which you study
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Is there a Book for you, from which you read?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Or have you a Book wherein you learn,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Or have you a book wherein you read,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Or have you a Book wherein you study?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Or have ye a scripture wherein ye learn
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Have you a Scripture that tells you
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Is there with you a Book wherein ye study:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Do you possess a scripture in which you read
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Or have ye a book through which ye learn-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Or have you a Book through which you learn.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Or, have you a Book from which you study
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Or do you have a scripture in which you study.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Or do you have a scripture in which you learn
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [68:37] Or (am lakum means a-lakum) do you have a Scripture, revealed, wherein you learn, [wherein] you read,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Or have ye a Scripture wherein you learn) wherein you recite
